text: Hasselt is a small city seven km north of Zwolle city, in the province of Overijssel, the Netherlands. About 7,400 people were living there in 2021. Hasselt was also a municipality. In 2001, it became a part of the new created municipality of Zwartewaterland, of which Hasselt is the seat. Hasselt got city rights in 1252, and joined the Hanseatic League about 1350. == References == * Plaatsengids.nl Category:21st-century disestablishments in the Netherlands Category:Cities in Overijssel Category:Former municipalities of Overijssel Category:Zwartewaterland
title: Hasselt, Netherlands
